actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution providing for the notification to the President informing him that a quorum of each House is assembled.

summary.text: Directs that a committee of two Senators be appointed by the Vice President to join such committee as may be appointed by the House of Representatives to wait upon the President of the United States and inform him that a quorum of each House is assembled and that the Congress is ready to receive any communication he may be pleased to make.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the notification to the President informing him that a quorum of each House is assembled.
